title: Keto Shrimp Scampi with Broccoli Noodles

Ingredients.1: 2 large heads  broccoli with long stems

Ingredients.3: 1 salt and ground black pepper to taste

Ingredients.5: 1 pound raw shrimp, peeled and deveined

Directions.1: Cut off broccoli florets and save for another use. Cut woody ends off the stems. Shave large knots off the stems using a vegetable peeler so that they are as uniform as possible. Cut into noodles using the smallest blade on a spiralizer.

Directions.2: Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add broccoli noodles, salt, and pepper; toss for 3 minutes. Remove from heat and set aside.

Directions.3: Heat remaining olive oil and garlic in a separate skillet over medium heat. Cook for 1 minute. Add shrimp and cook until opaque, about 3 minutes per side. Transfer shrimp to a bowl.

Directions.4: Add wine, lemon juice, butter, basil, chives, and red pepper to the skillet. Whisk over medium heat for 3 minutes. Return shrimp to the skillet and toss to coat.

Directions.5: Spoon broccoli noodles into 4 serving bowls. Top with shrimp mixture.
